title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
We've obtained what's needed – the ritual's location beneath the palace.

Choosing the second option prompts Astarion to assert that collectively, you will address the situation. This interaction will trigger an update.

Astarion met two of his fellow vampire spawn, Dalyria and Petras, at Fraygo's Flophouse. We learned Cazador plans to perform a ritual that will grant him incredible power, and that Astarion is part of it. They revealed it's taking place in a defiled chapel beneath Cazador's pala
